text: The Piedmontese regional election of 1980 took place on 8 June 1980. ==Events== Christian Democracy resulted narrowly ahead of the Italian Communist Party. After the election, the Italian Communist Party and the Italian Socialist Party decided to continue their political cooperation and formed a coalition government with the PSDI under the leadership of Socialist Enzo Enrietti.
